name: Spellbroken
description:
In a land where a city of zealots stands surrounded by wilderness, the Handlers patrol the frontier. Collie, a newly-minted squad leader, finds herself on a mission with her two squadmates to an abandoned building in the wilds. There, she reflects on her past in the face of her seemingly blessed role, and will face a fateful decision.

Spellbroken is the product of a team of four people: Cammy (programming/scripting), bug (music), liebe (visuals) and Punishedhag (writing/concept)

Contents:

  • 1-2 hours long, depending on reading speed
  • Original soundtrack
  • Character sprites, Event CGs and SFX
  • 2 Endings
  • Mousewheel scrolling!

Content Warnings:

  • Swearing
  • Written light sexual content
  • Contains no visuals or audio of sexual content
